instruction: Compile 4 actionable advice on managing a remote team.
output:
1. Utilize technology: To effectively manage a remote team, it is important to leverage technology to create a sense of connection and productivity. Utilize video conferencing, chat applications and virtual whiteboards. 

2. Establish clear communication protocols: Establish clear and concise communication protocols both among team members, and between the remote team and manager. Have regular meetings and check-ins to ensure everyone is on the same page.

3. Set expectations: Make sure to set expectations in a way that’s measurable and achievable. Set realistic objectives and goals and track progress over time to make sure team members are staying on track.

4. Foster engagement: To keep team morale high and make sure team members are engaged with their work, hold virtual team-building activities, recognition programs and encourage collaboration.
